specs.title: Pos_Fun_0001 - Convert Simple present tense sentence
Pos_Fun_0013 - Multiple spaces, line breaks, and paragraph inputs
Pos_Fun_0014 - Missing spaces / joined words (stress test)
Pos_Fun_0020 - Long paragraph with multiple simple sentences
Pos_Fun_0022 - English technical/brand terms embedded in Singlish
Pos_Fun_0023 - English abbreviations and short forms
Pos_Fun_0026 - Sentences containing places and common English words that should remain as they are
